DOC.brief_summary: This project is a clustered randomized controlled trial of a knowledge translation intervention of new ACOG guidelines for the diagnosis of poor progress in labor. The intent is to reduce the rate of cesarean section (CS) in first time mothers without increasing maternal or neonatal morbidity. The guidelines were developed from data from the Consortium for Safe Labor. The unit of randomization will be sites in Alberta that deliver
DOC.brief_title: The REDUCED Trial: REDucing the Utilization of CEsarean Sections for Dystocia
DOC.criteria: Centers in Alberta that provide intrapartum care, have facilities to perform cesarean section and deliver at least 70 primparous women annually
